text: Lois Cleveland Chiles (born April 15, 1947)Profile, entertainment.msn.com; accessed April 9, 2016. is an American actress and former fashion model. She was born in Houston, Texas. Chiles is known for her roles as a Bond girl Dr. Holly Goodhead in the 1979 James Bond movie Moonraker, and as a driver in 1987's Creepshow 2, as well as such movies as The Great Gatsby, The Way We Were, Death on the Nile and Broadcast News. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Models from Texas Category:Actors from Houston Category:Actresses who played Bond girls
title: Lois Chiles
